verses.verse: David<WH1732> therefore departed<WH3212> there,<WH8033> and escaped<WH4422> to the cave<WH4631> Adullam:<WH5725> and when his brothers<WH251> and all<WH3605> his father's<WH1> house<WH1004> heard<WH8085> it, they went<WH3381> down<WH3381> thither<WH8033> to him.

And every<WH3605> one<WH376> that was in distress,<WH4689> and every<WH3605> one<WH376> that was in debt,<WH5378> and every<WH3605> one<WH376> that was discontented,<WH4751> <WH5315> gathered<WH6908> themselves to him; and he became<WH1961> a captain<WH8269> over<WH5921> them: and there were with him about four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> men.<WH376>

And David<WH1732> went<WH3212> there<WH8033> to Mizpeh<WH4708> of Moab:<WH4124> and he said<WH559> to the king<WH4428> of Moab,<WH4124> Let my father<WH1> and my mother,<WH517> I pray<WH4994> you, come<WH3318> forth,<WH3318> and be with you, till<WH5704> I know<WH3045> what<WH4100> God<WH430> will do<WH6213> for me.
And he brought<WH5148> them before<WH854> <WH6440> the king<WH4428> of Moab:<WH4124> and they dwelled<WH3427> with him all<WH3605> the while<WH3117> that David<WH1732> was in the hold.<WH4686>

And the prophet<WH5030> Gad<WH1410> said<WH559> to David,<WH1732> Abide<WH3427> not in the hold;<WH4686> depart,<WH3212> and get<WH935> you into the land<WH776> of Judah.<WH3063> Then David<WH1732> departed,<WH3212> and came<WH935> into the forest<WH3293> of Hareth.<WH2802>

When Saul<WH7586> heard<WH8085> that David<WH1732> was discovered,<WH3045> and the men<WH582> that were with him, (now Saul<WH7586> stayed<WH3427> in Gibeah<WH1390> under<WH8478> a tree<WH815> in Ramah,<WH7414> having his spear<WH2595> in his hand,<WH3027> and all<WH3605> his servants<WH5650> were standing<WH5324> about<WH5921> him;)

Then Saul<WH7586> said<WH559> to his servants<WH5650> that stood<WH5324> about<WH5921> him, Hear<WH8085> now,<WH4994> you Benjamites;<WH1145> will the son<WH1121> of Jesse<WH3448> give<WH5414> every<WH3605> one of you fields<WH7704> and vineyards,<WH3754> and make<WH7760> you all<WH3605> captains<WH8269> of thousands,<WH505> and captains<WH8269> of hundreds;<WH3967>

That all<WH3605> of you have conspired<WH7194> against<WH5921> me, and there is none that shows<WH1540> <WH241> me that my son<WH1121> has made<WH3772> a league<WH3772> with the son<WH1121> of Jesse,<WH3448> and there is none<WH369> of you that is sorry<WH2470> for me, or shows<WH1540> <WH241> to me that my son<WH1121> has stirred<WH6965> up my servant<WH5650> against<WH5921> me, to lie in wait,<WH693> as at this<WH2088> day?<WH3117>

Then answered<WH6030> Doeg<WH1673> the Edomite,<WH130> which<WH1931> was set<WH5324> over<WH5921> the servants<WH5650> of Saul,<WH7586> and said,<WH559> I saw<WH7200> the son<WH1121> of Jesse<WH3448> coming<WH935> to Nob,<WH5011> to Ahimelech<WH288> the son<WH1121> of Ahitub.<WH285>
And he inquired<WH7592> of the LORD<WH3068> for him, and gave<WH5414> him victuals,<WH6720> and gave<WH5414> him the sword<WH2719> of Goliath<WH1555> the Philistine.<WH6430>

Then the king<WH4428> sent<WH7971> to call<WH7121> Ahimelech<WH288> the priest,<WH3548> the son<WH1121> of Ahitub,<WH285> and all<WH3605> his father's<WH1> house,<WH1004> the priests<WH3548> that were in Nob:<WH5011> and they came<WH935> all<WH3605> of them to the king.<WH4428>
And Saul<WH7586> said,<WH559> Hear<WH8085> now,<WH4994> you son<WH1121> of Ahitub.<WH285> And he answered,<WH559> Here<WH2005> I am, my lord.<WH113>

And Saul<WH7586> said<WH559> to him, Why<WH4100> have you conspired<WH7194> against<WH5921> me, you and the son<WH1121> of Jesse,<WH3448> in that you have given<WH5414> him bread,<WH3899> and a sword,<WH2719> and have inquired<WH7592> of God<WH430> for him, that he should rise<WH6965> against<WH413> me, to lie in wait,<WH693> as at this<WH2088> day?<WH3117>

Then Ahimelech<WH288> answered<WH6030> the king,<WH4428> and said,<WH559> And who<WH4310> is so faithful<WH539> among all<WH3605> your servants<WH5650> as David,<WH1732> which is the king's<WH4428> son<WH2860> in law,<WH2859> and goes<WH5493> at<WH413> your bidding,<WH4928> and is honorable<WH3513> in your house?<WH1004>

Did I then<WH3117> begin<WH2490> to inquire<WH7592> of God<WH430> for him? be it far<WH2486> from me: let not the king<WH4428> impute<WH7760> any<WH3605> thing<WH1697> to his servant,<WH5650> nor to all<WH3605> the house<WH1004> of my father:<WH1> for your servant<WH5650> knew<WH3045> nothing<WH3808> <WH1697> of all<WH3605> this,<WH2063> less<WH6996> or<WH176> more.<WH1419>
And the king<WH4428> said,<WH559> You shall surely die,<WH4191> Ahimelech,<WH288> you, and all<WH3605> your father's<WH1> house.<WH1004>

And the king<WH4428> said<WH559> to the footmen<WH7323> that stood<WH5324> about<WH5921> him, Turn,<WH5437> and slay<WH4191> the priests<WH3548> of the LORD:<WH3068> because<WH3588> their hand<WH3027> also<WH1571> is with David,<WH1732> and because<WH3588> they knew<WH3045> when<WH3588> he fled,<WH1272> and did not show<WH1540> it to me. But the servants<WH5650> of the king<WH4428> would<WH14> not put<WH7971> forth<WH7971> their hand<WH3027> to fall<WH6293> on the priests<WH3548> of the LORD.<WH3068>

And the king<WH4428> said<WH559> to Doeg,<WH1673> Turn<WH5437> you, and fall<WH6293> on the priests.<WH3548> And Doeg<WH1673> the Edomite<WH130> turned,<WH5437> and he fell<WH6293> on the priests,<WH3548> and slew<WH4191> on that day<WH3117> fourscore<WH8084> and five<WH2568> persons<WH376> that did wear<WH5375> a linen<WH906> ephod.<WH646>

And Nob,<WH5011> the city<WH5892> of the priests,<WH3548> smote<WH5221> he with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> both men<WH376> and women,<WH802> children<WH5768> and sucklings,<WH3243> and oxen,<WH7794> and asses,<WH2543> and sheep,<WH7716> with the edge<WH6310> of the sword.<WH2719>
And one<WH259> of the sons<WH1121> of Ahimelech<WH288> the son<WH1121> of Ahitub,<WH285> named<WH8034> Abiathar,<WH54> escaped,<WH4422> and fled<WH1272> after<WH310> David.<WH1732>
And Abiathar<WH54> showed<WH5046> David<WH1732> that Saul<WH7586> had slain<WH2026> the LORD's<WH3068> priests.<WH3548>

And David<WH1732> said<WH559> to Abiathar,<WH54> I knew<WH3045> it that day,<WH3117> when<WH3588> Doeg<WH1673> the Edomite was there,<WH8033> that he would surely tell<WH5046> Saul:<WH7586> I have occasioned<WH5437> the death of all<WH3605> the persons<WH5315> of your father's<WH1> house.<WH1004>
Abide<WH3427> you with me, fear<WH3372> not: for he that seeks<WH1245> my life<WH5315> seeks<WH1245> your life:<WH5315> but with me you shall be in safeguard.<WH4931>
